PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-14132010-11-18HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActHazardous Products Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule 1 to the Hazardous Products Act (Cribs, Cradles and Bassinets )
PrecisOrder amending SCHEDULE I TO THE HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS ACT (CRIBS, CRADLES AND BASSINETS) in order to improve the protection of the health and safety of young children with regards to the use of cribs, cradles and bassinets, by amending the previous Cribs and Cradles Regulations of the Hazardous Product Act, as well as Item 25 of Part II of Schedule I of the Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0262 Publication Date: 2010-12-08
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Amending Schedule 1 to the Hazardous Products Act (Cribs, Cradles and Bassinets )
precis: Order amending SCHEDULE I TO THE HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS ACT (CRIBS, CRADLES AND BASSINETS) in order to improve the protection of the health and safety of young children with regards to the use of cribs, cradles and bassinets, by amending the previous Cribs and Cradles Regulations of the Hazardous Product Act, as well as Item 25 of Part II of Schedule I of the Act.
